column1: Has to be better sites than a travel forum for relocation issues, surely?

I am an expat myself living in Barcelona. As you might know catalunya is going to be under lockdown. People can enter and leave under certain circumstances (don’t know if you can enter tho). I’d suggest you would seek information at your spanish consulate by email or phone. Most consulates are overwhelmed with emails and phones at this time tho.
Are you moving for work, study, retirement? If you have options, this may be a good time to defer the move.

as 55nrdtofly said, if you have the option postpone your arrival. just bakeries, supermarkets/groceries and pharmacies will be open next days. public transport restrictions could be implemented soon so not the best time to move to a new place.
